briefdescription.para: Does a SPI controller node have chip select GPIOs configured?

detaileddescription.para: SPI bus controllers use the "cs-gpios" property for configuring chip select GPIOs. Its value is a phandle-array which specifies the chip select lines.

briefdescription.para: Number of chip select GPIOs in a SPI controller's cs-gpios property.
Does a SPI device have a chip select line configured? Example devicetree fragment:
Get a SPI device's chip select GPIO controller's node identifier.
Get a SPI device's chip select GPIO controller's label property.
Get a SPI device's chip select GPIO pin number.

detaileddescription.para: It's an error if the GPIO specifier for spi_dev's entry in its bus node's cs-gpios property has no pin cell.

briefdescription.para: Get a SPI device's chip select GPIO flags.

simplesect.para: flags value of spi_dev's chip select GPIO specifier, or zero if there is none
1 if the instance's bus has a CS pin at index DT_INST_REG_ADDR(inst), 0 otherwise

briefdescription.para: Get GPIO controller node identifier for a SPI device instance This is equivalent to DT_SPI_DEV_CS_GPIOS_CTLR(DT_DRV_INST(inst)).

simplesect.para: node identifier for instance's chip select GPIO controller

briefdescription.para: Get GPIO controller name for a SPI device instance This is equivalent to DT_SPI_DEV_CS_GPIOS_LABEL(DT_DRV_INST(inst)).

simplesect.para: label property of the instance's chip select GPIO controller
pin number of the instance's chip select GPIO
flags value of the instance's chip select GPIO specifier, or zero if there is none

briefdescription.para: SPI Devicetree macro public API header file.
